flags.name: --source
flags.validation: Must be one of: xbe, expert, giant_anchor (e.g., --source xbe).

permissions: Requires an authenticated admin user (is_admin true).
side_effects: Updates specified glossary term fields; after save, enqueues asynchronous definition suggestion updates when the term changes.
validation_notes: The glossary term id argument is required. At least one of --term, --definition, or --source is required. term must be unique case-insensitively. source, if provided, must be one of: xbe, expert, giant_anchor.
